headline: Align Technology Expands In Asia As Investors Weigh Growth Versus Margin Strains
summary: Align Technology expanded its Invisalign System offerings in Southeast Asia, including launches with mandibular advancement in Thailand and the Philippines. The company advanced its iTero Digital Solutions platform, adding new capabilities to support clinicians and drive broader adoption. Affordability initiatives were extended across select Southeast Asian markets, aiming to reach a wider base of consumers. For investors tracking NasdaqGS:ALGN, these moves come with the stock trading at...

headline: Here’s Why Giverny Capital Asset Management Sold Align Technology (ALGN)
summary: Giverny Capital Asset Management, LLC, an investment management company, recently published its fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the same can be downloaded here. The Portfolio returned 0.01% compared to 2.66% for the S&P 500. YTD, the fund returned 12.58% compared to 17.88% for the Index. The firm faced a challenging fourth quarter and calendar year, […]
